result.execSummary:
The defendant Shawn P King was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Shawn P King is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Shawn P King was found guilty of Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $290.60 fine/cost to be paid to the Clerk of Court's Office.  To be paid out of seized monies.
Must provide DNA sample and pay the $250.00 DNA surcharge to the Clerk of Court's Office from the seized monies.
May not possess or use firearms or body armor.

May not vote or hold public office until civil rights are restored.
If not a U.S. citizen, may face deportation.

Must undergo COMPAS evaluation and follow through with criminogenic needs as recommended by Probation.
Must remain sober.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shawn P King

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
